            <div class="card-body"><div class="star-rating-container"><div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-4.75  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 95%"></div>

                                                                <footer class="footer footer-default">
            <div class="footer-aux">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <h4><strong>Descarcă aplicația eMAG </strong></h4>
                        <small>Lasă-ne numărul tău de telefon și îți vom trimite link-ul de download.</small>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <div class="pad-sep-sm">
                            <form class="send-me-a-message" action="https://www.emag.ro/mobile-app-send-sms" method="POST" novalidate="true">
    <div class="form-group mrg-sep-none">
        <label for="user-related-phonenumber-1211834903" class="sr-only">Trimite SMS catre orice numar</label>
        <div class="input-group">
